did.unittitle: John McLaughlin 1981 Hunger Strike Ephemera Collection
did.abstract: The collection consists of articles, newspaper clippings and posters related to the Irish Hunger Strikes and other Irish Republicanism activities. Both American and Irish Press are represented.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Materials were collected by John McLaughlin and donated to the Archives of Irish America in 2000. Issues of The Nation 1986-1995, have been housed in the Periodicals Collection AIA 004.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged into one series.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The materials in this collection were collected to document the reaction to the Hunger Strikes in Ireland of 1981 and Irish-American activitism, notably the organization, Irish Northern Aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains ephemeral material related to the Hunger Strikes of 1981 and and to the organization Irish Northern Aid. Contents include posters, magazine articles and newspaper clippings.
